NAME: Luminescence
CITATION: Kreutzer, S., Schmidt, C., Fuchs, M.C., Dietze, M., Fischer, M., Fuchs, M., 2012. Introducing an R package for luminescence dating analysis. Ancient TL 30, 1–8.

NAME: RLumShiny
CITATION: Burow, C., Kreutzer, S., Dietze, M., Fuchs, M.C., Fischer, M., Schmidt, C., Brückner, H., 2016. RLumShiny - A graphical user interface for the R Package ’Luminescence’. Ancient TL 34, 22–32.

NAME: RLumModel
CITATION: Friedrich, J., Kreutzer, S., Schmidt, C., 2016. Solving ordinary differential equations to understand luminescence: “RLumModel”  an advanced research tool for simulating luminescence in quartz using R. Quaternary Geochronology 35, 88–100. doi: https://doi.org/10.1016/j.quageo.2016.05.004

NAME: numOSL
CITATION: Peng, J., Dong, Z., Han, F., Long, H., Liu, X., 2013. R package numOSL: numeric routines for optically stimulated luminescence dating. Ancient TL 31, 41–48.

NAME: BayLum
CITATION: Philippe, A., Guérin, G., Kreutzer, S., 2019. BayLum - An R package for Bayesian analysis of OSL ages: An introduction. Quaternary Geochronology 49, 16–24. doi: https://doi.org/10.1016/j.quageo.2018.05.009

NAME: TLdating
CITATION: Strebler, D., Burow, C., Brill, D., Br ckner, H., 2017. Using R for TL dating. Quaternary Geochronology 37, 97–107. doi: https://doi.org/10.1016/j.quageo.2016.09.001

NAME: tgcd
CITATION: Peng, J., Dong, Z., Han, F., 2016. tgcd: An R package for analyzing thermoluminescence glow curves. SoftwareX 1–9. doi: https://doi.org/10.1016/j.softx.2016.06.001

NAME: KMS
DESCRIPTION: Collection of functions to simulate kinetic models for quartz luminescence production
CITATION: Peng, J., Pagonis, V., 2016. Simulating comprehensive kinetic models for quartz luminescence using the R program KMS. Radiation Measurements 86, 63–70. doi: https://doi.org/10.1016/j.radmeas.2016.01.022

NAME: DRAC
DESCRIPTION: Dose rate and luminescence age calculator
CITATION: Durcan, J.A., King, G.E., Duller, G.A.T., 2015. DRAC: Dose Rate and Age Calculator for trapped charge dating. Quaternary Geochronology 28, 54–61. doi: https://doi.org/10.1016/j.quageo.2015.03.012

NAME: Analyst
DESCRIPTION: The standard programme to analyse luminescence data
CITATION: Duller, G.A.T., 2015. The Analyst software package for luminescence data: overview and recent improvements. Ancient TL 33, 35–42.

NAME: ChronoModel
DESCRIPTION: Chronological Modelling of Archaeological Data using Bayesian Statistics with an advanced graphical user interface

NAME: ESR
DESCRIPTION: R package 'ESR' for plotting and analysing ESR spectra in dating applications

NAME: gammaSpec
DESCRIPTION: A collection of functions to analyse gamma spectra

NAME: DosiVox
DESCRIPTION: A Geant 4-based software for dosimetry simulations relevant to luminescence and ESR dating techniques
CITATION: Martin, L., Incerti, S., Mercier, N., 2015. DosiVox: Implementing Geant 4-based software for dosimetry simulations relevant to luminescence and ESR dating techniques. Ancient TL 33, 1–10.

NAME: DosiVox2D
DESCRIPTION: A Geant 4-based software for dosimetry simulations relevant to luminescence and ESR dating techniques; simplified version in comparison to DosiVox

NAME: Viewer
DESCRIPTION: Proprietary software to visualise luminescence data recorded in BIN/BINX-files

NAME: Viewer+
DESCRIPTION: Proprietary software to visualise luminescence data recorded in BIN/BINX-files; sucessor of Viewer

NAME: PTanalyse
DESCRIPTION: Proprietary software to analyse TR-OSL data

NAME: RLanalyse
DESCRIPTION: Proprietary software to analyse radiofluorescence data (BIN/BINX-file input required)

NAME: XRFanalyse
DESCRIPTION: Proprietary software to analyse XRF data recorded with a Risø OSL/TL attachement

NAME: RadialPlotter
DESCRIPTION: Java software to create radial plots
CITATION: Vermeesch, P., 2009, RadialPlotter: a Java application for fission track, luminescence and other radial plots, Radiation Measurements, 44, 4, 409-410

NAME: DensityPlotter
DESCRIPTION: Java application for Kernel Density Estimation plots
CITATION: Vermeesch, P., 2012. On the visualisation of detrital age distributions. Chemical Geology, v.312-313, 190-194, doi: 10.1016/j.chemgeo.2012.04.021 0

NAME: MCDoseE
DESCRIPTION: Dose response curve fitting, dose evaluation for ESR dating
CITATION: Joannes-Boyau, R., Duval, M., Bodin, T., 2017. MCDoseE 2.0 A new Markov Chain Monte Carlo program for ESR dose response curve fitting and dose evaluation. Quaternary Geochronology 44, 1–25. doi: https://doi.org/10.1016/j.quageo.2017.11.003
